article: 3 Simple Ways to Completely Power Down Your iPad or iPad Pro
intro: If you need to save battery, or if you're not going to use your iPad for a while, you can power it off completely. This can be done using the physical buttons or from the settings app. Here's how to completely power down your iPad with and without a Home button.

steps.title: Wait at least 30 seconds.
steps.subtitle: It may take a moment for your iPad to fully power off.
